body:
Hi there Keisei, I've read the whole thread by now, nothing in it can solve this problem. Thing is, I am in the exact same situation as you. the resulting graph of my radiation analysis is only a huge blue tone on my subject of analysis.. everything shows up as 0 kWh/m2. I could work with the same files (.gh , .epw , and even .3dm) in other computers and its works perfectly fine, lots of detailed results come up. I can use Ladybug for other analysis (drybulb temperature analysis mostly) in my computer and its working well.. so I believe it isn't a LB problem. 
I am using a mac with windows 7 through parallels. Were you able to solve this problem? Otherwise, does somebody know a solution to this problem? It's nightmare...! thanks!
